languages.text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} the character makes reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Каждая атака персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} цели на {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% до конца боя. Этот штраф применяется до расчета {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Every character's melee attack reduces the target's armour by −<u>(2 × Strength bonus)</u>% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before the damage is calculated. Stacks.
Every character's melee attack reduces the target's armour by −<u>(2 × STR bonus)</u>% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before damage is calculated. Stacks.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} the character makes reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.

Every character's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before damage is calculated. Stacks.

This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del personaje reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo un −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} % hasta el final del combate. La reducción se aplica antes de calcular el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} the character makes reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del personaje reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo un −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} % hasta el final del combate. La reducción se aplica antes de calcular el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

Cada {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del personaje reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo un −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} % hasta el final del combate. La reducción se aplica antes de calcular el daño. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}するたび、戦闘終了時まで対象の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}%減少する。この減少効果は、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}計算前に適用される。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} the character makes reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}するたび、戦闘終了時まで対象の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}%減少する。この減少効果は、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}計算前に適用される。この効果はスタックする。
キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}のたびに、対象の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を戦闘終了時まで −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}%する。この減少効果は、ダメージ計算前に適用される。この効果は累積する。

languages.text: 每当该角色进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}%，直到战斗结束。此减免效果在{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}计算之前生效。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} the character makes reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当该角色进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}%，直到战斗结束。此减免效果在{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}计算之前生效。此效果可叠加。
该角色的每次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}%，直到战斗结束。此减免效果在伤害计算之前生效。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Charakters reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} %. Diese Reduzierung wird vor der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadensberechnung{/g} angewendet. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} the character makes reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Charakters reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels um −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} % bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Diese Reduzierung wird vor der Berechnung des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} angewendet. Stapelbar.

Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Charakters reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels um −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Diese Reduzierung wird vor der Schadensberechnung angewendet. Wird aufaddiert.

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} effectuée par le personnage réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette réduction est appliquée avant le calcul des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} the character makes reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% until the end of combat. This reduction is applied before {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is calculated. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} du personnage réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette réduction est appliquée avant le calcul des dégâts. Cumulable.

Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} du personnage réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de -{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cette réduction est appliquée avant le calcul des dégâts. Cumulable.

languages.text: Karakterin yaptığı her {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhını{/g} %{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} kadar azaltır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu azaltım, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} hesaplanmadan önce uygulanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
